body: ## OkCupid Match Messenger (Ruby Version) A Ruby Script to Auto-Message All of Your OkCupid Matches. ### Installation Install dependencies. gem install watir ### Quick Start Enter your OkCupid credentials and specify the message you want to send in the script. Start the Ruby script. ruby okcupid_match_messenger.rb
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: OkCupid Match Messenger Ruby CLI
tagline: A Ruby Script to Auto-Message All of Your OkCupid Matches
